Investor_0_pre_2.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0_pre_2.content: My reputation has been affected by this investment process. I acknowledge that I exhibited a level of naivety by placing excessive trust in the trustee's proposed allocation plan without sufficient scrutiny of its execution. This has highlighted the need for me to be more vigilant and rigorous in assessing potential trustees to better safeguard my interests. Overall, I see myself as a cautious investor who is learning to adapt and refine my evaluation processes to enhance future investment success.
